name: In Too Deep (Team Horsehead)
description:
You're a miner working hard to get ores, as you want to upgrade your weapons to be platinum, and show everyone in the village how cool you are! 

These mines are riddled with amazing ores, so many of them, but there are also enemies which are out to get you! Use your pickaxe and swords to mine ores and kill enemies, and you can also buy bombs and portals and drills to add more action!

--- How To Play --- 

WASD: Move

Space: Jump in portal

Left Mouse Button: (With pickaxe) Dig / (With sword) Attack / (With bomb) Throw Bomb

E: Collect Ores from drill

--- Tips --- 

Portals: Place one as an entrance, and another on a lower floor as an exit. These handy shortcuts will save you a lot of time!

Drills: Place this down and it'll dig up a resource for you! Come back later to pick up everything it's collected

Leaving: You can leave the cave at any time to save your resources. If you die you will lose what you've collected that run. If you do leave, you'll need to start from the top again next time.

Bag: Your backpack can initially only store 100 items, but you can upgrade it at the shop

Bombs: Bombs are a lot of fun!

Bugs: We definitely tried to do too much in too short a time (as usual!) so there may well be bugs, but hopefully you can enjoy what we managed to put together!

--- Credits ---

Joe Shanahan: Programming, 3D

Scott Richards - Programming

Amy Elliott - Programming, Environment, Art

Tash Briggs - 3D, Level Design
